name: SAVE THE CORE (easypeazygames)
description:
How long can you protect the core from a flurry of foes?

This game was made from scratch for ScoreSpace Jam #17, in GameMaker Studio 2.

Updated after the jam period, which is the release marked post-jam.  For the purposes of rating, please play 0.1.0.2.  Also, for high score purposes, the gameplay has been completely rebalanced and scoring drastically overhauled, so try to compete for high scores across the same version if this is picked for streaming.

Design by Maya Zimmerman & Ani Mei Kao

Programming by Maya Zimmerman

Art by Ani Mei Kao & PoeSchmo

Music by Evan Carville

Controls are:

Move with WASD, arrow keys, left stick, or d-pad

Attack with left click or A

Teleport by moving mouse and right click or moving right stick and pressing B
